name: Add new HubSpot contacts to VoiceDrop campaigns automatically
description:
Streamline your marketing efforts by automatically adding new HubSpot contacts to your VoiceDrop campaigns. This template seamlessly connects HubSpot CRM with VoiceDrop, ensuring every new contact is imported with all necessary details correctly mapped for precise targeting.

By syncing contact information—including phone numbers and other custom fields—from HubSpot to VoiceDrop, this workflow guarantees personalized and highly effective campaigns. It eliminates manual data entry, saving time while keeping your audience data fresh and accurate for your ringless voicemail marketing.

How it works:

A new contact is created in HubSpot

Contact details, including phone number and other relevant fields, are extracted

The contact is automatically added to the selected VoiceDrop campaign

To ensure smooth integration, make sure the extracted fields from HubSpot correspond exactly to the fields required by your VoiceDrop campaign.

This template was created by [VoiceDrop].
